name: Mitosis Juggler
description:
A simple 2D juggling game. Bounce cells into petri dishes. Addictive non-stop no-frills action with a relentless difficulty curve. Test your focus and reactions. Submit your results to the leaderboard.

Features super un-realistic depiction of microbiology and scientific grants. And collision physics. But it might be fun for a few minutes!

Terms of Use: https://vastahako.gitlab.io/terms.html
